Title: The Kalamazoo
Writer: David Hollander, Ann Biderman (created by), Gina Welch (staff writer), Lenore Zion (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Ray is adrift from his family, estranged from Ezra, and his latest celebrity client is a nobody with tawdry sense. But after he's called to the funeral of a close friend. A wealthy family ...
